Paris has decided to join the Earth Hour movement and join their fight against climate change. Help the City of Lights plunge into darkness by finding all the levers needed to shut down the city lights.

How to play:

- Walk across the color tiles and use the levers needed to turn the city lights off.
- Do not step off the tiles or you'll be teleported back to the start.
- Use the subway station teleport and look for the remaining 3 hidden levers.
- Once you have found them, step on one of the black tiles to receive the prize.
22earth03.title: Earth Hour!
22earth04.text:
South America

The next part of the trip will take you to South America to learn more about how the fall of dead branches affect the amount of carbon dioxide that gets released into the atmosphere.

How to play:

- Make it across the Amazon forest and watch out for the trees that may fall at any time.
- Be careful when waking through the one way doors, if you step on the red tile you will need to start again.
- You have one minute to reach the ring tile and complete the game.
22earth04.title: Earth Hour!
22earth05.text:
Oceania

Climate change has been one of the main reasons for the increase of deadly fires around the globe in recent years.

These wildfires have destroyed the homes of many animals, leaving them trapped with no way out. This time you'll need to help the animals make it out in time before the fire reaches them.

How to play:

- Rescue the 4 animals that have been trapped by the fire by running through the wall of flame. You will need to run in and out of the fire as fast as you can or you might find yourself trapped by the flames.
- If you get stuck and can't find a way out, just say *:reset* to start again.
- Once all the animals are safe, walk on the white lines on the road before the time ends to receive your prize.
22earth05.title: Earth Hour!
22earth06.text:
Africa

Your team has decided to head over to Africa, more precisely to a village located in the south of Kinshasa in the Democratic Republic of Congo.

Your mission this time will be to plant 3 different types of flowers and trees and that will bring different benefits to the village and its people. Allan will guide you throughout the whole process, just make sure to listen carefully to what he says and follow his instructions.

How to play:

- Walk over to the RIP monster plants and stand next to them and say **take a sample**
- Stand in front of Allan's desk and listen to the instructions that he'll give you.
- Find the correct fertilizer for each plant and say **pick up**
- Walk back to the RIP monster plant and say **pour it**, the last thing left to do is pull the lever to watch the flower grow.
- Follow these steps to plant the 3 sprouts you need to complete the game.
22earth06.title: Earth Hour!
22easter1.text:
The Easter Bunny needs your help!

The Easter Bunny is busy preparing for Easter but this time he needs your help finding the eggs that got lost in the woods. Help the Bunny find the missing eggs and be careful not to run into the wild wolves that are roaming around looking for food.

You will need to tell the Easter eggs apart from the animal ones - you don't want to take the wrong egg with you!

How to play:

 - Stand near the egg you want to pick up.
- Walk towards the hole and bring the Easter egg with you. Be careful not to walk too fast or you'll drop the egg.
- Keep an eye for the animals that are out there hunting. If they catch you, you'll immediately lose.
- Find the 3 hidden eggs and help the bunny collect them before the time runs out to win a badge.
22easter1.title: Happy Easter!
22feb01.text:
Schools of Samba spend months preparing for the carnival parade, from designing the theme, building the floats to rehearsing the dance. Now the time has come for the schools to give their all in the performances they've prepared.

Get to experience the spirit of community and dance your heart out representing your school.

How to play:

- Dance out the choreography by stepping on the green tiles.
- Each time you step on a green tile, you'll get 1 point. If you step on a red tile you will lose 1 point.
- Score 20 points before the time ends in order to win.
22feb01.title: Escola de Samba!
22feb02.text:
It's that time of the year when the streets get filled with crazy costumes, and loud music to celebrate the world's biggest carnival. 

As soon as King Momo kicks off the Rio Carnival, get ready to see some of the best street parties and join the crowds dancing to the tune of samba.

   How to play:

- Pull the switch and answer the questions about the Rio Carnival. Make sure to answer all 3 questions correctly to move to the next part of the game.
- Dance your way around the parade area and find the hidden badge.
22feb02.title: Rio Carnival!
22feb03.text:
Come celebrate Portugal's biggest festival of the year and join the thousands of people who come from all over the world to take in the culture.

If you're all about great music, amazing food, and unique costumes like you've never seen before Portugal is the place for you!

How to play:

- Keep a close eye on the bots sitting on the pink clouds and watch the masks they'll be wearing at the start of the game. Remember which masks goes on each bot.
- Stand on the tile in front of each bot and watch the different masks appear.
- When the bot is wearing the right mask, type * to lock in your decision. Be sure you choose the right mask, you won't be able to change masks later.
- During the course of the game you will get a question related to the Portuguese Carnival, you'll only have 20 seconds to answer. If you don't answer within those 20 seconds, you will automatically lose.
- Use the camera when you're done assigning the masks. If the order is right you will win a new badge. Boa sorte!
22feb03.title: Carnival Time in Portugal!
22feb04.text:
Cologne is the place to be during carnival season. Come celebrate the "crazy days",  from getting kisses on the cheek from strangers to getting your tie cut off by women in costumes - you can be sure to expect the unexpected!

How to play:

- Guide the old lady to the orange tiles using the arrow plates and type * to turn the orange tile green.
- Color the 6 tiles on the carnival float by stepping on them until they've turned *blue*. Do not step on the red tiles or you'll lose.
- After the red tiles have turned green, step on one of them to finish the game and the receive the prize.
22feb04.title: Klle Alaaf!
22feb05.text:
La Mojadera!

The water trucks are filled with water and ready to go around the streets spraying people. We hope you don't mind getting soaked because that's basically what will happen to you during la mojadera.n
How to play:

- A water pump furni will appear in the room, race towards it and be the fist one to click on it.
- You'll be teleported to the car where you'll wait for Franco to ask you a question.
- To choose an answer pull one of the levers in front of the letters.
- If you answer correctly you'll win a badge. Good luck!
22feb05.title: Carnival in Panama!
22feb06.text:
The  Piazza San Marco is the center of this celebration that expands over the entire city. From watching Il Volo dell'Angelo which officially kicks off the carnival, to attending masquerade balls, parties and parades. The Venice Carnival will take you back to another era!

How to play:

- Guide the boat to the dock using the arrow tile, while you avoid the floating rocks on the water.
- After you've completed the first task, guide the bot to the color tiles and answer the questions correctly.
- Complete the game before the time ends to win the badge.
22feb06.title: Venice Carnival!
22feb07.text:
Known for its floats decorated with huge heads and characters as tall as 20 meters high, the Nice Carnival is one of the most famous carnivals in the world.

Experience the Battle of the Flowers from up close and try to catch as many flowers as you can.

How to play:

- Catch the flowers being thrown from the floats. Don't catch the wrong furni or you'll be eliminated from the game.
- Pull the lever and read carefully the question. To answer, you'll need to fully write the right answer from one of the options given.
- If you answer correctly you'll be teleported to the next set of tiles.
- Make sure to catch all the flowers and answer the questions correctly to win a brand new badge.
22feb07.title: Nice Carnival!
22feb08.text:
El Entierro de La Sardina

This is not your normal parade but it's actually a funeral procession for the sardine. If you think that's bizarre, you're in for a treat! Before the burial, the sardine is paraded through the streets of Tenerife, followed by men dressed as priests and women dressed as widows while they pretend to cry for the sardine.

 How to play:

- Walk near the campfires that are moving around the room and let them crash into you to catch them.
- After you've caught them, step on the bonfire to wear the fire effect.
- Catch all the sardines that are moving around the room by walking near them.
- There are two water effects hidden, if you step on one of them and lose the fire effect you will have to stand on the bonfire again.
- After you've finished catching all the fish, stand on the bonfire before the time ends to win your prize.
22feb08.title: Carnival of Tenerife!
22june01.text:
Backstage Pass

 The members of Whitepurple are known for reinventing themselves in each outfit they wear. Their looks are a big part of the band's identity and this time they need your help finding the right outifits to wear on their next album cover.

 h2. How to play:

 - Find the clothes that the bots are wearing. Once you have the right piece, stand on the arrow tile in front of it to collect it.
 - Each outfit consits of 4 different pieces, find all of them for the next bot to come out.
 - You'll need to replicate the outfits of 3 bots to complete the game.
 - When you're done, wait for the timer to end to get a sunglasses effect and a new badge.
22june01.title: K-Town!
22june02.text:
The band has finally designed and produced their very own Kpop lightsticks for their fans to bring to their concerts and show their support.

The package company that was supposed to bring these sticks to the studio seems to have dropped them in the wrong place. As part of the band crew, you'll have to fix this issue and head out to the city to collect the band's lightsticks and bring them back.

How to play:

- Stand on the tile and read what the bot has to say.
- Collect the lightsticks in the right order by watching the tile change colors. To grab a lightstick, double click on it or click on "Use"
- When crossing the street make sure to only walk when the light is green.
- Before heading back to the studio you will need to grab some food. Sit on the stool that will appear and when the bot has handed you your order, stand on the yellow tile to collect your prize.
22june02.title: K-Town!
22june03.text:
Recording Studio

The band has gotten together to finish recording their new album that's coming out this summer. Fans have been waiting a long time for the band to release new music, so the expectations are high!

This time you'll work as their music producer taking care of the song arrangements and bringing the band's vision to life.

How to play:

- Each color tile moving towards you represents the rythm of the song.
- Time your movements carefully and wait for the moving tile to be in right place before you step on the color tiles around you
- You have 1 extra life to help you to play. If the heart lamps are off it will mean you have lost it.
 - Survive for 1 minute in order to win.
22june03.title: K-Town!
22june04.text:
The band is enjoying a well deserved day off before their big concert. All they've asked is to find a place where they can have some privacy to enjoy their evening.

Your job this time will be to keep the paparazzis at bay, the last thing the band wants is to see a picture of their night out on tomorrow's papers.

How to play:

- Block the paparazzi from taking the band's pictures by stepping on the star tile before they do.
- Keep an eye out for them at all times. You will have to anticipate which part of the room they'll go to and reach the star tile before them.
- In order to win the game you will need to protect the band for a whole minute.
- If the paparazzi manages to beat you to the star 3 times, you will automatically lose.
22june04.title: K-Town!
22june05.text:
The big day is here! The time has come for the band to hold their biggest concert yet. After all the rehearsals and months of preparation, everything was ready for the band's big night but unfortunately things don't always go as expected and Pink seems to have come down with a case of food poisoning.

They say to always be ready for the unexpected but this is the worst case scenario anyone could have imagined. Someone needs to step up to the plate and fill in for Pink. Are you up for the challenge?

How to play:

- The band will show you the different choreography they have prepared for the show.
- Pay attention to all the steps, you will need to recreate them afterwards. Don't take your eyes away from the routine even for a second, Kpop bands are known for their intricate dance choreography.
- To win the game you will need to successfully copy all the steps from the 3 dance routines they'll show you.
22june05.title: K-Town!
22june06.text:
Enjoy a day in the beautiful island and admire all the coloured fields full of flowers. Don't miss your chance to get to meet the locals, they're known for being welcoming people.

How to play:

- Walk to the white gate and listen to what Navin has to say.
- The gate will open every 20 seconds to let a new player in.
- Find the 3 celestial flowers (celestial_c19_flower) the gardener needs in 45 seconds in order to win.
22june06.title: Flower Island!
22march01.text:
Dinner Hall

Despite being aware there's a threat to his life, King Frank has decided to host the annual dinner at the castle for his closest acquaintances.

Help protect the king by not letting anyone get near the tables before the guests get here.

How to play:

- Keep an eye out on the color tiles, as soon as one of them turns green you will need to sit on the sofa in front of it before the bot.
 - Once seated say **prevent** to keep the guard away from the food.
- You will need to block the guard 8 times in order to complete the game.
- Don't let the bot get to the tables first or you'll immediately lose.
22march01.title: The Legend of King Frank
22march02.text:
You need to get the king to a safe place before they find him. Guide him back to his room and watch out for the traps placed throughout the corridor.

How to play:

- Walk carefully around the tables and avoid the rats that have been released in the room.
- Cross over the rollers and avoid stepping on the red carpet.
- The enemy has managed to steal the armour from the guards, move past them carefully and make sure they don't catch you.
- If you fall in any of the traps, you'll be locked in the gibbet for 3 seconds.
- You have 90 seconds to complete the game, when you're done take the arrow teleport to the next room.
22march02.title: The Legend of King Frank
22march03.text:
Find the hidden room by using the right lever that will open the secret bookshelf.

How to play:

- Use the levers around the room to unlock the door.
- Find the 4 correct levers that will turn the green lights on.
- As soon as you've found them enter the secret bookshelf to win the prize.
22march03.title: The Legend of King Frank
22march04.text:
Your next task will be to find the magic sword hidden somewhere in the castle.

How to play:

- Go around the room and find the right couch that will teleport you over to the yellow tiles.
- Walk towards the tiles across the room only when the lamps are off.
- When you're done, take the teleport to the next room.
22march04.title: The Legend of King Frank
22march05.text:
Warehouse

You have found the castle's warehouse, this could be a good place to keep the magic sword in.

How to play:

- Walk around the boxes and the find the right route to the levers. Use the levers to unlock the gates.
- Don't let the spiders touch you or you'll go back to the start.
- You have 90 seconds to complete the game and take the attic door teleport to the next room.
22march05.title: The Legend of King Frank
22march06.text:
You have finally found the room with the magic sword.

How to play:

- You have 40 seconds to light up the torches in the room by using the swords.
- Watch out for the mouse traps, if you step on them you'll lose time.
- To complete the game you'll need to sit on the green chair and say *claymore!*
22march06.title: The Legend of King Frank
22march07.text:
Treasure Chamber

Thieves have found a way inside the treasure chamber where the kingdom's gold is kept. Stop them before they steal the gold.

How to play:

- As soon as you see the bot appear, race to the side he's on and pull the lever to block the exit.
- Make sure to pull the lever before he reaches the arrow tile.
- When rotating around the square, don't step on the red tiles or you'll immediately lose.
- You need to stop the thief 3 times before the timer ends in order to complete the game.
22march07.title: The Legend of King Frank
22march08.text:
Dungeon

The king's daughter has been locked in one of the cells, get her out before someone comes in.

How to play:

- Look for the keys in the room and test them to see which one will open the cell's door.
- Stand in front of the keys and say *:grab*, then stand on the ringplate to find out if it's the right key.
- You have 90 seconds to get yourself and the princess out of the dungeon.
22march08.title: The Legend of King Frank
22march09.text:
Dungeon

The traitor is about to make his way out of the castle. Catch him before he escapes.

How to play:

- Wait for the gates to open and grab a sword from the rack and wait for your turn to be teleported inside the game area.
- Stop the traitor from escaping by blocking his way out.
- Stand on one of the tiles next to him and say * to make that tile disappear.
- Run to the next set of tile before the tiles disappear or you'll lose.
- Once you've made it to the other side, pull one of the levers to catch the traitor and receive your prize.
22march09.title: The Legend of King Frank
22nerv01.text:
A maximum of 12 can play at the same time and the objective is to survive and not get "killed" by any of your opponents.

The game needs at least 4 players in order to start.

How to play:

- At the start of the game, Frank will take food from the fridge. If he gets a *carrot*, everyone has to run to the center of the board (pink square) and wait for a number to come up.

 1 - You kill 1 person.
 2 - You kill 2 people.
 3 - You die.
 4 - You choose someone to kill for you.
 5 - You kill a person and you die.
 6 - Everyone dies.

If you manage to be the last Habbo standing you'll need to play one last round and survive in order to win.

Remember that if you get 3, 5 or 6 you will be eliminated but you'll survive if you get  1, 2, or 4. At the end of the game just pull one of the levers to win the badge. Good luck!
22nerv01.title: The Nervous Game
22oct01.text:
Welcome Lounge

People have been noticing a strange energy around the hotel for the past few days. Head over to the Welcome Lounge and talk with Frank to see what's going on.

How to play:

- Stand on the ring plate and use the bathroom door to help Frank.
- To catch the ghosts you'll need to double click the dark magic teleport when the ghosts are floating above the other end. You'll need to find the right timing when to click the teleports.
- Click on the chest next to Frank to teleport him out of there.
- After you've caught the two ghosts, walk over the tiles and step on them when the zombie hand is above the skeleton ghost to catch him.
- Complete the game before the timer ends to collect the prizes.
22oct01.title: Fallen Angels
22oct02.text:
Picnic Room

Demons are spreading to different public rooms looking for Laylah, the angel who fell in love with Dracula whose statue is hidden somewhere in the hotel.

Be careful when exploring the Picnic room, zombie hands are creating chaos by chasing after Habbos to take them to the underworld with them.

How to play:

- Escape the zombie hands that are chasing you by using the pillows inside the square.
- You'll need to survive for 30 seconds in order to win but don't get too comfortable the hands will start moving faster as there's less time left in the timer.
22oct02.title: Fallen Angels
22oct03.1.text:
Retro Headquarters

You've found your way inside the retro, now it's time to get rid of everything before more Habbos get scammed

How to play:

- Stand on the 5 tiles placed inside the computer and type * to set the room on fire
- Watch out for the Evil Franks, if they catch you, you'll go back to the queue.
- When you're done, stand on the tile plate that will appear near the candles to win an exclusive badge and a Pumpkin mask effect.
22oct03.1.title: Fallen Angels
22oct03.text:
Retro Headquarters

Fallen angels have set up their own retro headquarters inside the hotel to trick Habbos into their illegal versions of the game to store their information and hack their accounts.

Find the room where they keep their server and get rid of it before more Habbos get scammed.

How to play:

 - Walk towards the tile next to the gothic table. You can only move when evil Frank is not in the room.
- Once you've made it to the other side of the room take the teleport to continue.
22oct03.title: Fallen Angels
22oct04.text:
A Night in the Cemetery

The gate leading to the underworld has been opened letting demons inside Habbo. Someone has to venture across the cemetery and take the daring journey of going to the underworld and finding the keys needed to lock the gates.

How to play:

- The room is divided into 4 small games. Carefully read each of the message wireds instructions before you start.
- Once you've completed the first 3 mini games, a brave Habbo will need to "sacrifice" themselves for the ritual to work by entering the Vampire Coffin. This sacrifice will either teleport the brave Habbo to the end of the game or back to the start.
- When the last metal gate has been opened, you'll have 5 minutes to cross the other side by sitting on the moving coffins. Complete the game before the time ends to win the prizes.
- After the 5 minutes have elapsed the metal gates will close again and everyone who didn't make it will need to complete the small games again. Good luck!
22oct04.title: Fallen Angels
22oct05.1.text: Operation: Hell's Gate\n\nFind the right teleport that will take you to the room where Lucifer keeps the keys.
22oct05.1.title: Fallen Angels
22oct05.2.text: Operation: Hell's GateYou've found the room with the keys. Out of the 4 keys in the room only 2 of them will lock the gates, find the right ones before the timer ends.How to play:- Stand next to each key and say * to find the right ones.- Lucifer has set a few bobby traps to protect the keys: watch out for the fireballs, if you get hit by one of them you'll be teleported back to the start.- When you have found the keys, stand on the zombie hands to get your prizes.
22oct05.2.title: Fallen Angels
22oct05.text:
Operation: Hell's Gate

It's time to find the keys that will close the gates and prevent more demons from entering Habbo. It's a dangerous job, but someone has to do it.

How to play:

- You have 1 minute to reach the occult teleport on the other side of the room.
- Don't walk too close to the fire or you'll lose.
- Make sure Lucifer's Hellhound doesn't see you or you'll be teleported back to the queue
- When you're done, take the teleport to continue.
22oct05.title: Fallen Angels
22penguin01.text:
In a not so distant past, Habbo was ruled by penguins of all kinds whose reign lasted a long time. But as everything in life has an end, the heat started to return to the hallways of Habbo and our furry friends decided to return to their homes.

 A few weeks ago, Frank received a letter from one of the penguins, inviting him to visit their ice castle in the Antarctic coast.

This year a mega maze has arrived to put your skills to the test! Each level will be focused on one of our old penguins, so get ready!

How to play:

To start your journey, go the start room where you'll be able to access the maze from its 3 different points:

- Level 01: Start of the maze
- Level 11: You can use this checkpoint if you've already collected the level 10 badge (make sure to be wearing the badge)
- Level 21: You'll need to have the level 20 badge to use this checkpoint (make sure to be wearing the badge)

The levels are intuitive, you just need to observe what each scenario suggests. None of the levels will kick the player from the room, they will all return to the start point of the level they're in except for level 20 which will have its own info terminal with the instructions of how to play.

*LEVEL 20*: Players will need to survive in the game arena by running away from two penguins and a gladiator. If the player is caught by a penguin, they will return to the beginning of that level. However, if they are caught by the gladiator, they will return to level 19.

IMPORTANT: The difficulty of the games will increase every 10 levels. That way, the maze is divided into 3 different levels:

Easy (01-10): requires minimum experience from the player, but it will be required that the player has patience to complete the levels;
Medium (11-20): requires considerable experience from the player, but with patience and persistence it's possible to complete the levels;
Insane (21-30): levels focused on skills and will require time and a lot of mastery from the players to complete it.

NOTES:

- If you get stuck in any level, just type "exit" to leave the game area;
- It is possible that some of the insane levels may not work correctly on mobile.
22penguin01.title: Penguin Maze : A Blast From the Past!
22penguin02.text:
How to play:

- To complete this level you will need to survive in the game area by running away from two penguins and the gladiator.
- If you get caught by one of the penguins, you'll be teleported to the start of this level. However, if you are caught by the  gladiator, you'll return to *level 19*.

Good luck!
22penguin02.title: Penguin Maze : A Blast From the Past!
22pride01.text:
Habbo Pride City

The city is ready to celebrate its annual Pride parade. Help the city finalise the last details and put your knowledge about LGBTQIA+ culture to the test.

How to play:

- Walk on the tiles until you've turned them into the same colors as the Pirde flag.
- Pick up the small confetti from the ground by stepping on them.
- For the last part, pull the lever and answer the question by typing the letter with the correct answer: **a*, **b* or **c*
- You have 120 seconds to complete the game and win the badge.
22pride01.title: Habbo Pride City
22puzzle01.text:
Sliding Puzzles!

Puzzle aficionates, we got the perfect game for you!

The rules are simple: just step on the puzzle piece you want to move until you form the picture for each puzzle. You can use the pictures above as a guide.

In order to skip a puzzle you have already completed, just wear the badge to continue with the next one.

Below is the time you'll have to solve each puzzle:

 - Puzzle 1: 4 minutes
- Puzzle 2: 8 minutes
- Puzzle 3: 16 minutes

To take the tele just say *:tele1*
22puzzle01.title: Sliding Puzzles!
22rock01.text:
World Rock Day!

Join us in celebrating World Rock Day with this new event our builders have put together. The game will consist of 3 different levels that will get more difficult as you progress through them.

How to play:

Level 1:

- Step on the color tile when the ball is on top of the yellow/black blocks.
- If the ball reaches the fire tile you will immediately lose.
- Survive for 60 seconds in order to continue to the next level.

Level 2:

- Just like before, step on the color tiles when the balls are over the black/yellow blocks and don't let them reach the fire tile.
- Keep an eye out for the bombs that will appear during the game. Don't let them reach the color tiles. In order to do this you will need to step on the color tile they're heading to and type *
- This level will also last 60 seconds.

Level 3:

- The objective of this level is to align each color ball in the right order so when they start moving they'll land on their corresponding color.
- To move each ball you will need to step on their color tile and type *. You have 8 seconds to place them in the correct order.
- When the balls are over the color tiles, step on the green tiles to lock your answer. If you don't step on the green tiles at the right time, you will lose a life. You will have 2 lives for this level.
- Complete 2 sequences to win the game.
22rock01.title: World Rock Day!
22sept00.text:
Habtris

To play this game make sure you are wearing one of the badges from the War of the Seasons games.

How to play:

- Use the arrow tiles to move and rotate the pieces.
- If the pieces reach the top you'll lose.
- Survive for 3 minutes to win the badge.
22sept00.title: War of the Seasons
22sept01.text:
Tic Tac Toe

We all know this classic, the objective of the game is to put your mark (X or O) in the squares until you get 3 in a row.

How to play:

- Double click on the plates to put your mark in one of them.
- If the first round ends in a tie, you'll play a second round. If a second tie happens, both players will lose.
- Each player has 10 seconds to play.
22sept01.title: War of the Seasons
22sept02.text:
The goal is to have one of your color blocks go around the board until it lands in the center. The first person to do this wins

How to play:

- When it's your turn to play, you'll need to pull the lever that will appear in front of you and wait for a random number to come up. The number will represent the number of spaces you will move.
- If someone from the opposing team lands on the same square as you, you'll die and the opponent wins the match.
- Each player has 10 seconds to play.

NOTE: The bots count as players, if they eat one of your blocks you'll lose. If the bot wins, everyone loses.
22sept02.title: War of the Seasons
22sept03.text:
Connect Four

The objective is to connect 4 color tiles in a row while preventing the player from the opposite team from doing the same.How to play:

- Each player will have 20 seconds to make their move by clicking on the executive lamps.
- The first player to make a row of 4 tiles vertically, horizontally or diagonally wins.
 - If a player leaves the match or loses by exceeding the time limit and they have not made at least 10 moves in the round, the game will reset and a new opponent will enter to play in their place.
22sept03.title: War of the Seasons
22sept04.text:
Hac-man

The rules are simple: step on the your team's color tiles while you avoid the balls moving around the game area.
You can use the banzai teleports to move to different parts of the board. The winner will be the first person to collect all their team's color tiles before the time runs out.
Good luck!
22sept04.title: War of the Seasons
22sid00.text:
Get ready to become a GDPR expert with the games we've prepared.

These are the dates when the games will open:

* Comic 2 - 10/02
* Comic 3 - 15/02
* Comic 4 - 17/02
Make sure to wear the badge from the previous chapters to take the teleports.

Complete all 4 comics to win a new SID plushie!
22sid00.title: Safer Internet Day 2022!
22sid01.text:
What's personal data?

Personal data, is any information related to an identifiable person. For example: Did you know that IP address have been recognised as personal data since 2011?

How to play:

- Walk around the room and find the furnis that will get the bots to tell you more about personal data.
- When the green lights have all light up, press the green button to be teleported to the next part of the game.
- Read each question carefully and step on the green tile if you think the answer is *YES*, or step on the red tile if you think the answer to the question is *NO*.
- When you're done take the conference door to the next room.
22sid01.title: Safer Internet Day 2022!
22sid02.text:
What's sensitive data?

It's personal data around sensitive topics : racial origin, ethnical, political opinions, religion, philosophical believes, health...

Health data

Health information is any personal information about your health and disability. It includes information about illness, injury or disability.

Biometrics data

Biometrics data is a way to measure a person's physical characteristics that can help verify their identity. These can include physiological traits (fingerprints, eyes) or behavioural characteristics. The most common example of a biometric recognition system is a phone's fingerprint and facial recognition technology

Genetic data

Genetic data is personal data related to inherited or acquired genetic characteristics that give unique information about the a person's physiology or health. This type of data can be obtained through DNA or RNA analysis.

How to play:

- After Dr. Lolo talks to you, say **fill in health form**
- Organize the different types of sensitive data by pulling the levers next to the stool.
- Each lever will rotate the purple and yellow rollers until they're facing the right direction.
- Guide each furni to their respective color tiles.
- Complete the game before the time ends to continue to the next part.
- If you get stuck, say *:reset*
22sid02.title: Safer Internet Day 2022!
22sid03.text:
Watch the scene unfold inside the book and carefully read the information below to learn what data processing is, and the different types of data processing that are used.

What is data processing?

Data processing is the gathering, or use of personal data by a processor who follows the instructions that the data controller sets on a contract.

There are 3 main methods of processing data: manual, mechanical and electronic.

1) Manual Data Processing: Is done by humans without the use of electronic devices.

2) Mechanical Data Processing: Is done through the use of devices and machines. Simple data processing operations can be done with this method which has less errors than manual data processing.

3) Electronic Data Processing: This method uses modern technologies, like software and programs. This method offers the most reliable results.

How to play:

- Watch the scene inside the book and press the green button when it's over.
- Assign the furni to the right bot depending on the method of processing data they used in the scene.
- Use the arrow tiles to guide the furni and place it in front of each bot.
- Complete the game before the time ends to continue to the last part of the chapter.
22sid03.title: Safer Internet Day 2022!
22sid04.text:
What is a data controller?

Data controllers are the natural or legal person who determines alone or with others *'why'* and *'how'* personal data should be processed. 

Users can contact the data controller and withdraw their permission at any time. Once they've withdrawn their permission, the company or organisation cannot continue using their personal data.

How to play:

- Go to the supermarket and find the following items: meat, vegetables and, dried goods. When you're done step on the green tile to hear what Yaniss has to tell you.
- Find yourself a new look on Zaba, all you need to do is enter the changing booth and type *
- Stand on the green tile in front of Loulli and listen to what she has to say.
- When you're done, use the Tokyo drink machine to be teleported to the game.

- Read each sentence carefully and determine whether they're True or False. You'll need to say *:true* or *:false*  to submit your answer.
- The gates will open only if you answer correctly.
- When you've made it through the gates, walk over the rollers until you reach the color tiles. Step on them and say * to change their colors.
- Enter the one way door and say *I completed chapter 1* to finish the game and win the badge.
22sid04.title: Safer Internet Day 2022!
22sid05.text:
Right to access

Users can ask the controller to provide them a copy of their personal data that is being processed. This data should be made available to them at latest within one month. The information can be provided to them in writing, electronically or verbally.

 The right to access gives users other rights, such as rectification and erasure.

Right to rectification

This gives users the right to have their data corrected by the controller. In the cases when the data is not completed, it also gives users the right to complete it by providing the missing information.

How to play:

- Follow the message instructions in the game.
- To access your data, please say: *access data*
- To rectify your data, please say: *rectify data*
- Stand in front of David and say **sign**
- When you're done, use the green button to continue

- Pull the lever to read the question.
- Walk over the color tiles, to see the possible answers, and press the green button.
- Use the arrow tiles to guide the bot to the color tile with the correct answer.
- When you're done, take the teleport to the next room.
22sid05.title: Safer Internet Day 2022!
22sid06.text:
Right to portability

This gives users the right to request their data to be securely transferred from one business to another.

Users can obtain and reuse their personal data for their own purposes.

How to play:

- Follow the message instructions in the game.
- Go to Dorian and say *close account*. Tell David you're not interested in the offer he made by saying *no, thanks*
- Once the vault appears, step on the orange tile and say **sign**, and click on the vault.
- Walk up to Antoine and say *transferred data*

- Pull the lever to read the question.
- Step on the color tiles to see the possible answers and press the green button.
- Walk over the safes and step on the color tile that you think is the right answer and say *
- Answer all the questions correctly, and take the teleport to the next room.
22sid06.title: Safer Internet Day 2022!
22sid07.text:
Right to erasure

Allows users to request that all the data a business holds about them is deleted. Data controllers have 30 days to respond an erasure request.

How to play:

- Pull the lever for the game to start.
- Remember the order of the letters in the keyboard. Walk on each key and say * on it.
- After the 4 lights have turned green, step on the green block to continue.
- Pull the lever to be teleported inside the book.

- Step on the tile in front of Dorian and say *erase data*
- When the tile has turned green, step on it again.

- Use the lever next to the chair.
- Remember the order of the letters, walk on the right keys and say *
- Step on the green block when the lights have turned green.
- Use the green button to complete the game.
22sid07.title: Safer Internet Day 2022!
22sid08.1.text:
Questions:

1) In which case can data controllers continue processing your data?

A. Marketing purposes.
B. When it's needed for legal claims.

2) The right to object needs to be handled by:

A. Controller
B. Lawyer

3) Can a controller continue storing data after a user has restriced the processing of their data?

A. No, the controller cannot store or use the data.
B. Yes, they can continue storing it but cannot use it.

4) Can a restriction request be denied?

A. Yes, if the request is unfounded or excessive

B. No, the controller is obligated to apply it.
22sid08.1.title: Safer Internet Day 2022!
22sid08.text:
Right to object

With this right a user can ask a company to stop processing their personal data at any time. The controller can't continue processing the user's data unless they can prove with legitimate reasons that the processing of the information needs to continue.

A user needs to give the reasons why they want the processing of their data to stop. They can communicate this to the data controller verbally or in writing.

Right to restriction of processing

A user can limit the way a data controllers users their personal data, it can be used as an alternative to deleting the personal data.

How to play:

- When the scenes are done, press the green button.
- Stand on the blocks and guide them to the tiles with their same colors. To move the blocks use the commands: *W,A,S,D*
- If you get stuck, stand on the ring plate and say *:reset* to start again.
- When you're done, stand on the arrow tile to be teleported to the green stool.
- Read the questions in the second info terminal and choose the option with the correct answer. To answer just say *:a* or *:b* before you reach the blue tile.
- Finish the game in time to win a new badge.
22sid08.title: Safer Internet Day 2022!
22sid09.text:
Right to be informed

Users have the right to be informed about the collection and use of their personal data.

In these cases, controller's need to inform about things like: purpose of the processing, duration of storage, the rights of the data subject, the ability to withdraw consent, etc.

How to play:

- Walk up to Alyx and ask him to show you the personal data that has been collected by saying right to be informed
- Listen to what the bots have to say and pay attention to the letters at the end of each sentence. When they're done, press the green button to continue.
- Stand on the color tiles and associate the examples in them to the personal data collected by the bots. Type the correct letter while standing on the tiles (:a, :b, :c)
- If you get stuck, stand on the ring plate and say :reset
- When you're done take the teleport to the next room.
22sid09.title: Safer Internet Day 2022!
22sid10.text:
Filing a complaint

There are 3 types of complaints that can be filed by a user:

1) Submit complaint to a Data Protection Authority

Users have the right to submit a complaint to a DPA. The DPA needs to inform the user on the progress and the outcome of the complaint.

2) Submit complaint against a Data Protection Authority

Every user has the right to submit a complaint when a DPA does not handle a complaint or does not inform the user within 3 months on the progress or outcome of the complaint.

Proceedings against a DPA need to be brought before the courts.

3) Submit complaint against a controller or processor

Users can submit a complaint when they consider their rights have been violated during the processing of their personal data in a way that goes against the GDPR regulations.

Proceedings against a controller or a processor need to be brought before the courts.

How to play:

- When the scene is over, press the green button.
- Sit on pura modules and move across the game area until you reach the color tiles.
- Step on them and answer the question by typing the letter with the right answer (:a , :b or :c)
- Answer the 3 questions correctly before the time ends and take the teleport to next room.
22sid10.title: Safer Internet Day 2022!
22sid11.text:
Sanctions

Any person who has suffered damage as a result of a GDPR infringement has the right to receive compensation from the controller or processor for the damage suffered.

Fines can be applied in addition to or instead of other remedies like the order to end a violation, an instruction to adjust the data processing to comply with the GDPR, or even impose a temporary or permanent ban on data processing.

The fines need to be proportionate to each individual case. For severe violations the fine can be up to 20 million euros, or up to 4 % of their total global turnover, whichever is higher.

How to play:

- Watch the scene and when it's done, pull the lever to be teleported to the game area.
- Read the questions and possible answers in the second info terminal.
- When you're ready pull the lever to start the game.
- Walk back and forth the color tiles until they've turned into the right color for the answer you want to choose. (*A* - orange, *B* - pink or *C* - green)
- After that, walk towards the letter and press the green button to submit your answer.
- Answer correctly the three questions before the time ends to complete the game and win the badge.
- If you get stuck, stand on the arrow tile and say *:reset*
22sid11.title: Safer Internet Day 2022!
22sid12.text:
Questions

*1) GDPR fines are designed to sanction only for large businesses, there are other measures for smaller businesses.*

a) True nb) False
*2) Less severe infringements could result in a fine of:*

a) 10 million, or 2% of the firm's worldwide annual revenue
b) 20 million, or 4% of the firm's worldwide annual revenue
*3) Which of these criteria are used to determine whether a fine is needed and the amount:*

a) Intention or gravity
b) Preventive measures
c) All of the above
22sid12.title: Safer Internet Day 2022!
22sid13.text:
This time it's your turn to protect other people's personal data from a security breach. Make sure none of the data is lost in order to win the game.

How to play:

- Sit on the chair and pull the lever to start the game
- Step on the books that will appear in the game area before the hackbot reaches them.
- For every time you get to the books first you'll win 10 points. You'll need to score a total of 100 points to move on to the next part.
- Walk across the color tiles and don't step on the black floor. When you reach the furnis, stand on the green tile and say * to collect the items.
- Make it to other side of the room before the hackbot reaches the red tile and step on the ring plate to complete the game.
- If you get stuck, stand on the arrow tile and say *:reset*
22sid13.title: Safer Internet Day 2022!
22snake01.text:
Welcome to Snake, the game you know and love from your mom's Nokia phone! Right now, you're on the first level of the noob difficulty.

There are 5 difficulty stages, and a total of 36 levels. At each difficulty stage, you'll be awarded a cool badge, and upon completing the hardest difficulty stage, you will receive a unique snake trophy (untradeable). The trophy can be earned once every 5 days per user.

How to play:

Step on the arrow plates to get in the queue. As soon as it's your turn, you can control the snake with the 4 arrow plates. Each level has a unique objective, and different mechanics will be unveiled as you explore all of them.

Most levels are cleared when a certain score is reached, or when the snake steps on a green color tile. Some levels are cleared automatically when you survive long enough.

You will receive specific instructions per level as you walk on the queue's rollers. You will also get a time limit. If you can't make the level in that time, you will lose and need to try again. The time limit is very generous 90% of the time.

Checkpoints

Need to log off but haven't finished the game yet? No worries! You can restart your latest difficulty by going back to the latest checkpoint you visited under owner: *snakemaster42* in the navigator. The checkpoints use leaderboards to track how many times you won!
22snake01.title: Snake Game
22snake02.text:
Snake game: the final level

You reached the final level, congratulations! Count yourself among the few lucky ones to have made it this far!

You didn't think you were anywhere close to finishing, right? This is the boss level of impossible mode after all. The first 35 levels were barely practice for what's to come! It's hard to hold back my evil laughter while typing this text, because I know the suffering from what's to come Don't tell Habbo Staff, but I was only able to finish this level once when creating this game.

But not to worry, you're in a different situation. After all, you're fighting to get the most epic snake badge of all Missing out on some sleep won't be an issue for you, right?

Are you up for the challenge?

This level is exactly like level 1 of the noob difficulty. The only difference being: you need to reach score 225, which is close to the maximum length of the snake.

The longer  the snake gets, the more you need to be careful about how you're moving the snake. You need to leave enough space for food to spawn. Snake food will never spawn directly next to a snake body part, so you need to make sure there are empty areas.

Also be careful about how you move around as you get bigger, because once you've surrounded yourself, there may be no way out.

The trick is to take it slow! The time limit for this level is 80 minutes, which is an insane overestimation of the actual time you need, so you've got more than enough time!

In this room, chat has been disabled for visitors to make sure you're not disturbed.

Is someone else already playing this level? Not to worry, this level has been duplicated 5 times, so you never have to stand in the queue! Step on the red color tile to play a copy of this level!

Good luck!
22snake02.title: Snake Game
22soccer01.text:
Habbo Football Legends

The World Cup fever has reached Habbo and we've got a new game for all of the die-hard football fans to put their skills to the test.

How to play:

- Move all 3 footballs into the goal zone before the time runs out.
- Get the highest score within the time limit!
- Collect bonus points by rolling the footballs over bonus zones. You'll get additional time for each stage completed.

23april01.text:
After experiencing huge growth over the past years, things in Sunlight City have taken a turn for the worse. The peace that its citizens have experienced for many years is at risk by the attack of robot animals. No one knows why all of a sudden these robots have started attacking people.

You'll look into who's behind all this at a later point, now you need to focus on helping the Sunlight citizens find a safe place to be in.

How to play:

- You have 30 seconds to get inside the game before the sci-fi door closes.
- Stay on the tiles to avoid falling into the empty space. The tiles will change to red before they disappear out of the game area. Make sure to stay focus and move quickly in order not to lose.
- If you manage to be the last person standing, step quickly on the green tile that will appear to win the prizes.
23april01.title: Bunny Eco World
23april02.1.text:
Now that the machine has stopped working you need to help the people in the city find a safe place to hide.

How to play:

- Move around the color tiles placed in the game and avoid getting hit by the robotic animals that are moving towards you.
- Survive for 45 seconds to win.
23april02.1.title: Bunny Eco World
23april02.text:
Isaac, Ada and Samuel are the 3 scientists responsible for developing the new bio-inspired robots. Their initial purpose was to create robots that could be used for research and experimentation, unfortunately one of these scientists has altered robots behavior to use them for their own benefit.

Get to know a bit more about them and see if you can figure out who's behind the hacking of the robots

- Isaac: He's the scientist in charge of the project. He's originally from the UK where he became a chemist. He's been working as a consultant for the government for the past 5 years.
- Ada: She's one of Poland's most famous environmental scientists. She has spent the last 2 years working on developing new kinds of renewable energy sources.
- Samuel: He graduated as an environmental engineer in Berlin's University of Applied Science. His main focus has always been finding solutions to the different environmental issues that affect our world.

Your task this time will be to enter the game and shut down the machine to stop more robotic animals from being created.

How to play:

- Step on the gray squares and type * to cut all the cables that make the machine work.
- Watch out for the Mecha Bunny if you get too close to it, you'll immediately lose.
- When you're done, sit on the stool in front of the solarpunk computer and say **hack** to complete the game.

- Use the teleport to go to the next room.
23april02.title: Bunny Eco World
23april03.text:
You have now found yourself inside the Science Center. Your objective this time is to find the secret lab used by one of the scientists to control the army of evil robot animals that are attacking the city.

How to play:

- Take one of the two teleports in the room to discover the different rooms in the Science Center.
23april03.title: Bunny Eco World
23april04.text:
You found the final room but unfortunately it is not the secret lab... Put your playing skills to the test and see if you can make it past the booby traps left in the room.

How to play:

- Cross the street and turn the red tiles green by stepping on them. Every time you make it to the other side you'll need to pull the lever next the to block number to win a point.
- In order to complete the game you'll need to get 3 points before the timer ends. Once you've reached *3 points*, pull the lever again to collect your prizes.
23april04.title: Bunny Eco World
23april05.text:
You've found a research facility that could lead you to the hidden laboratory. See if you can break the code to enter the next room.

How to play:

- Walk on the white tiles to copy the colors set on the colored square.
- You have 60 seconds to copy the colors on the empty tiles.
- When you're done, walk down the stairs and take the teleport to the next room.
23april05.title: Bunny Eco World
23april06.text:
Enter the lab and see if you can find out what kind of experiments were being developed in this abandoned lab and which scientist was behind the hacking of the robotic animals.

How to play:

 - Go up the stairs and step on the color tile to start the game.
 - In the first part of the game you need to get 4 points by stepping on the colors that match the tile next to the block number. The colors in the tile will change quickly so you need be to fast.
- When you're done, walk down the stairs and step on the white tile next to the cage to start the second game.
 - Step on the broken cables and type * to connect them back together.
 - When you're done, pull the lever and walk quickly towards the ring plate that will appear in the room to collect your prizes.
23april06.title: Bunny Eco World
23april07.text:
Access the Science Center's power room and shut down the generators to stop all the machines in the building from working.

How to play:

- Walk around the room and find the correct lever that will shut down the generators. Everytime you use one of the right levers, a green light will turn on.
- You have 1 minute to find the levers. When you're done, use the teleport to go to the next room and collect your prizes.
23april07.title: Bunny Eco World
23april08.text:
Now that you've gained access to the secret lab it's time to destroy it to prevent more robots from being developed.

How to play:

- Walk towards the Medicine Cabinet by Frank's portrait and grab a Habbo cola from it that will serve as fuel. Make sure to walk away from the cabinet with the correct hand item. (You may need to click on it a few times to get the Habbo cola)
- Step on the red tiles and type * to set the different parts of the lab on the fire. Make sure not to lose the hand item when walking in the room, if at any point you lose it you'll need to get it back from the Medicine Cabinet.
- You have 1:30 to complete the game and walk inside the cyber door to safely escape from the lab.
23april08.title: Bunny Eco World
23earth00.text:
Plastic waste found in the ocean has become one of the main environmental challenges our planet faces. Most plastics are not biodegradable which means they can be found in the environment for hundreds of years.

 This is why our team of scientists are taking matters into their own hands and diving to the bottom of the ocean to remove all the trash found there. Help them in their efforts to remove all the plastic waste from our oceans.

 How to play:

 - Start off by waving your hand (say *o/*) to dive to the bottom of the ocean and collect the first piece of trash. You'll need to go around and collect the trash in order.
- Step on the trash and make a  thumbs up (say *_b*) to get back to the surface and take the trash to the ringplate. Make sure to be on top of the trash when making the thumbs up otherwise it won't work.
- When floating next to the ringplate, click on the next piece of trash and wave (say *o/*) only when you're floating over the trash you want to collect.
- You have 1:45 to remove the 5 pieces of trash and collect the prizes.
- If you get stuck say *_b* to return to the surface

 [https://i.ibb.co/DRGHrQ0/earth.gif|*] [https://i.ibb.co/DRGHrQ0/earth.gif| Check out] this gif on how to play.
23earth00.title: Earth Hour 2023 - Ocean Cleanup
23earth000.text:
Our scientists are back taking on a new mission! Grab your oxygen and mask and get ready to dive with them to the bottom of the ocean where you'll get to see first hand how human pollution has negatively affected the marine ecosystems.

  Each day a new game will open where you'll get the chance to win brand new badges and an exclusive Turquoise Candle!

  These are the dates when the games will open:

  * Game 1 - 25.03 (*:tele1*)
 * Game 2 - 27.03 (*:tele2*)
 * Game 3 - 29.03 (*:tele3*)
 * Game 4 - 31.03 (*:tele4*)
23earth000.title: Earth Hour 2023!
23earth01.1.text:
Among the many things that affect coral reefs, the crown-of-thorns starfish which is a coral-eating starfish, has become a major cause of coral reef destruction. Touch them and you'll be painfully sorry for a long time.

 How to play:

  - You have less than a minute to save the corals from the starfish. To do so, you must click on the "smelly cheese" furni to teleport to where the coral is and earn a point.
- Once you've rescued 5 corals you'll need to wave your hand (say *o/*) to win the game.
- Watch out for the starfish! If it touches you, you'll lose the game.
23earth01.1.title: Earth Hour 2023 - Crown of Thorns Starfish
23earth01.text:
Even though they have survived for thousands of years, as time goes on there's less and less corals.This happens because of ocean acidification, local pollution, and above all, global warming.

  To try to save the coral reefs, some scientists and associations have decided to restore the reefs by transplanting corals from one place to another or by cultivating them on site thanks to the Coral Nurseries.

 How to play:

 - You have less than a minute to place all the coral cuttings on the rocks.
 - Watch out for the jellyfishes that are out to play and want to prevent you from completing your work.
- To help save the corals you will need to stand in front of them and wave "o/" when the coral is on the rock. You have to do this 5 times before the time ends.
- Once the 5 corals are on their rock, wave one last time to complete the game and win the prize.
23earth01.title: Earth Hour 2023 - Coral Nursery
23earth02.text:
Help the factory employees sort through the huge waste loads that have been collected. Their objective is to sort through the rubbish to obtain a higher quality of recycling with less impurities.

 How to play:

 - Pick up the items that are *not* made of plastic by stepping on them.
- A green button will appear after you've found all the items, press it to continue to the next room.
- You have 1:30 to complete the game.
23earth02.title: Earth Hour 2023 - Factory - The final sorting
23earth03.text:
Now that the trash has been sorted, it's time to start the recycling process in which you'll need to organize the items made of the same material, break them down, and reuse them in a different way.

 How to play:

 - Watch the items come out of the conveyor belt and try to guess the color group they will go to by stepping on the color tiles.
 - Make sure to wait for the item to be on the white tile before stepping on the color tiles.
- Here's a clue to start you off: 6 recycled juice cartons will create a teddy bear.
23earth03.title: Earth Hour 2023 - Factory - Recycling Process
23earth04.text:
Join the team's efforts on going underwater to help raise awareness on how marine life has been affected by the contamination of our oceans.

 They're bringing special tools needed to help them collect data and remove the waste accumulated on the ocean floor and it's causing a negative impact on marine ecosystem.

 How to play:

 - Type *:down* to dive underwater.
- Walk carefully over the path created by the undersea rocks. Be careful not to fall off them, or you'll be teleported back to the start.
- Step on the *bubble seats* you'll find along the way to get some needed oxygen from them. Once the nearest tile has turned green, it'll mean that you can continue crossing through the path made by the undersea rocks.
- To reach the bubble seats that are high above type *:up*. After the tile has turned green, you can step on it to continue.
- When you've reached the end of the path, press the green button to be teleported back to mecha machine and say: *up*
- Step on the arrow tile and use the runestone teleport to continue to the next room.
23earth04.title: Earth Hour 2023 - Sea Life - The rescue
23earth05.text:
Items like fishing gear, or discarded nets can cause damage to habitats like coral reefs or even trap and kill marine animals. In this game you will need to help rescue the turtle that's been trapped by the net and remove the marine debris you see lying around on the floor.

 How to play:

 - You'll start off the game in a battle mech machine that helps you dive to the bottom of the ocean. Type *:down* to start.
- Walk carefully down the rocks and pick up the 3 pieces of trash you'll find.
- Stand in front of the sword and use it to cut the nets that have trapped the turtle.
- With the sword effect on, stand on the mossy rock and type * to cut the net. The effect will disappear after cutting the net.
- To get the effect back, stand on the bubble seat in front of the arrow plate and type *:up* to be teleported to the top of the rocks.
- After you've helped free the turtle, you'll then need to help clean up the 5 pieces of trash you'll find lying around the floor.
- When you're done a green button will appear in the game. Press it to collect the prizes.

 *Note*: if you lose your turtle effect needed to pick up the last pieces of trash, you'll need to find the *sea turtle*  furnis and  walk on them and get the effect back on otherwise you won't be able to collect the trash.
23earth05.title: Earth Hour 2023  - Sea Life - The rescue
23easter01.text:
Catch the 9 flying badges that are moving around the room and get some additional prizes while you're at it!Some badges will also include 10 free diamonds for the first 50 Habbos that manage to catch them!

Make sure to first find the Easter Egg effect in order to get the diamonds *-*

Get ready, set, go!

 Please note that if you've already reached you're ducket limit the new duckets you win in the game won't be added to the total so make sure to spend them regularly!
23easter01.title: Flying Badges - Easter Edition!
23fast00.text:
Are you a team player? Well here's your opportunity to prove it! Grab 4 friends and get in line to put your game abilities to the test. If your team ends up in the top spot of the leaderboard at the end of the event each of you will receive a Sack of Coins! Good luck!

 How to play:

  - Each team of 5 players need to work together to complete 5 rounds. 4 players will be outside controlling the pillows.
- The first pillow controls the gate by saying "+" or "-"
- Heres' a summary of how each round will work:

- *Round 1:* Get the player to the ORANGE tile using your pillows as guides. (Outside users move on their platforms to move their pillows in the middle and the middle player can only walk on the pillows)

 - *Round 2:* Get the player to the BLACK pillow, using your pillows as stackable guides. (Outside users move their pillows the same way as round one, by stacking their pillows to make stairs for the middle player to climb up onto the black pillow)

 - *Round 3:* Turn all tiles PINK walk on GREEN u loose, and other players move pillows to assist. (Outside players move their pillows the same way as rounds 1 and 2, moving their pillows for the middle player to walk on, turning all tiles pink when sat on a pillow that is on top of the tiles)

 - *Round 4:* PINK guides all pillows, don't go on GREEN, users block the pillows to stop the pillow from stepping on GREEN. Get pillows to ORANGE tile. (The roles are reversed this round, The centre player will need to communicate where they will guide pillows. Outside players must block their pillow from going onto the GREEN tiles and guide all pillows to the ORANGE tiles, once your pillow is on the orange tile block it from moving again as all pillows must be on the orange tiles at the same time to win)

  - *Round 5:* Watch the tiles in the middle then copy the pattern by stepping on the tiles. (Basically, copy the pattern in the middle as fast as you can) (Red Zone controls 1st tile. - Blue Zone controls 2nd tile. - Yellow Zone controls 3rd tile. - White Zone controls 4th tile. - Pink Zone controls 5th tile.)

 [https://twitter.com/MadsInnitt/status/1638904564601479168?s,20 ] [[https://twitter.com/MadsInnitt/status/1638904564601479168?s,20] Check out] this link on how to play.
23fast00.title: Fast Cooperation!
23feb01.text:
Piccolo has found himself in a pickle! He downloaded a file attached to an email he received. He later remembered what Frank always told him: "Do not open emails from untrusted sources!"

It's been a couple of days since this happened and he has started to notice his computer acting up. To help him, you will need to get inside Piccolo's computer and help him recover the personal information that was stolen from him. When you've recovered his personal information, you will then need to make sure his computer is safe from any future threats by installing two important security tools:

   1) An **antivirus program** that will help detect, block and remove any malware from the system.
   2) A **firewall**, that will help protect his computer or network from unauthorized access and hacking attempts.

 How to play:

 - Walk up to Piccolo and sit on the stool to listen to what he has to tell you.
- Help him recover his personal information by stepping on the tiles until they've turned green.
- Watch out for the floating angels that are moving around, they're viruses designed to exploit Piccolo's computer.
- Once you've helped Piccolo recover all of his sensitive information, you'll need to pull the levers that will appear in the room to install the security tools that will keep his computer from any future attacks.
- You have 1:30 to help Piccolo. If you finish on time you'll win an exclusive badge AND a 2023 SID plushie.
23feb01.title: SID 2023 - Together for a better internet
23feb02.text:
Protect the Habbo galaxy from the underway invasion of thousands of RoboCat plushies that threaten to put the safety of the galaxy at risk. Do you have the skills needed to keep the invaders at bay?

 How to play:

 - Step on the arrow plates to move the plane sideways.
- Once you've placed it in the correct position, use the lever to shoot the RoboCat plushies or stop the shot coming towards you.
- If you let the  RoboCat plushies reach the green cables, you'll lose a life.
- Some cats will manage to get away from the shot by moving at the right moment, when this happens you'll have to quickly shoot at it again.
- At the end of the event the top 5 Habbos that manage to survive the longest will win an additional badge. Good luck!
23feb02.title: Habbo Space Invaders
23jan01.text: The Chinese lunar calendar dictates that this year is the year of the RABBIT! Help light up the red candles to complete the ritual that will help you attract good luck and prosperity for this new year.How to play:- You will have one and a half minutes to light the 7 red candles that are on the outskirts of the temple.- You'll need to stand next to them and type "*".- Watch out for the dragonflies! If they touch you, you'll be teleported back.- If you manage to complete the game before the time ends, you'll win the badge and a RubyBaby Penguin.
23jan01.title: Happy Chinese New Year 2023!
23jan02.text:
Put your knowledge of the Chinese New Year to the test with a quiz we've published  inside the temple.

 In order to access the temple you will first need to find the hidden lever that will give you the badge you'll need to wear to take the teleport.

 Once you've got the badge, stand on the Chinese lantern and take the teleport to the inside of the temple.

Everyone who answers *all* the questions in the poll correctly will receive an exclusive badge!
23jan02.title: Chinese New Year Quiz!
23june01.body:
Shape Quest: Geometry Challenge

Time to sharpen your knowledge of lines and angles! Your objective in this game is to survive inside the square without being hit by the colored cables. The game consists of 4 different levels that last for different amounts of time:

*Level D*: 45 seconds
*Level C*: 35 seconds
*Level B*: 20 seconds
*Level A*: 10 seconds

How to play:

- Move inside the square while avoiding getting too close to the cables.
- Everyone who makes it to level B will get a badge and will earn their team a point.
- Whoever reaches level A will also score a point on the leaderboard for the chance to win a Top 5 badge.

*Note*: The badge will be donated to you after you lose.
23june01.text:
Shape Quest: Geometry Challenge

Time to sharpen your knowledge of lines and angles! Your objective in this game is to survive inside the square without being hit by the colored cables. The game consists of 4 different levels that last for different amounts of time:

*Level D*: 45 seconds
*Level C*: 35 seconds
*Level B*: 20 seconds
*Level A*: 10 seconds

How to play:

- Move inside the square while avoiding getting too close to the cables.
- Everyone who makes it to level B will get a badge and will earn their team a point.
- Whoever reaches level A will also score a point on the leaderboard for the chance to win a Top 5 badge.

*Note*: The badge will be donated to you after you lose.
23june01.title: The Club Clash!
23june02.body:
Color Mystery

The Fine Art class has put together a game that only those with true artistic instincts will be able to pass.

How to play:

- Watch the color block that will appear behind the glass doors.
- Try to guess the correct color by standing on top of one of the color blocks on the floor.
- You'll need to move fast, you'll only have *12 seconds* to stand on the color block you think matches the one behind the glass doors.
- Everyone who guesses correctly will move on to the next round. You'll need to guess the correct color *4 times* in order to win the game.
23june02.text:
Color Mystery

The Fine Art class has put together a game that only those with true artistic instincts will be able to pass.

How to play:

- Watch the color block that will appear behind the glass doors.
- Try to guess the correct color by standing on top of one of the color blocks on the floor.
- You'll need to move fast, you'll only have *12 seconds* to stand on the color block you think matches the one behind the glass doors.
- Everyone who guesses correctly will move on to the next round. You'll need to guess the correct color *4 times* in order to win the game.
23june02.title: The Club Clash!
23june03.text:
Physics Lab:

Get ready to put your energy in motion and help your team accumulate the most points in this week's game.
How to play:

- Up to 10 people can be teleported into the game at the same time.
- The goal is to be the first one to reach the *green tile*  to help your team win a point.
- The tiles can turn yellow at any time, this means the entire row will disappear. You'll only have a few seconds to step off of them or you'll be eliminated.
- Watch out for the tiny doll walking around the game area, if it catches you you'll lose.
- You have 2 minutes to reach the green tile to help your team win a point and earn yourself a point for the chance to win a TOP5 badge
23june03.title: The Club Clash!
23june04.text:
Speed Rivals:

Lace up your sneakers and get ready to unleash your inner athlete in this week's game! This is a multiplayer game, meaning that up to 4 people can play at the same time but only 1 will come out victorious!

How to play:

- Start off by guiding the soccer balls to the tiles.
- Jump over the Habbo-lympic hurdles placed along the racetrack.
- Finish off by guiding the tiny dolls to the finish line using the the arrow tiles.

Ready, Get Set, Go!
23june04.title: The Club Clash!
23juneb1.body:
University Hallway

Congrats on reaching the bonus game! You're free to roam around the hidden corners of the campus where there's said to be hidden prizes including diamonds for the fastest Habbos!

In order to find these prizes you'll need to interact with the furnis placed around the room. Some furnis may contain prizes while others may give you clues about actions you'll need to perform to gain access to a challenge room.

The challenge room contains different objectives to be completed.The first 10 Habbos to complete them will win *20 diamonds*. The challenge room will deactivate after 10 Habbos have successfully completed all of the challenges.

23lab01.body:
Wired Add-on: Movement Physics

It allows furnis to keep their altitude, move through other furniture or move through users.

Click on the arrow plates to move the glowball and on the color tiles to enable each one of the wired options. If the color tile is green, it means that the option is enabled. If it is red, then the option is not enabled.

*Arrow and lock icon*: Keep furni altitude
*Chair icon*: Move through furniture
*User icon*: Move through users

23lab01.title: Welcome to the Habbo Wired Lab!
23lab02.body:
WIRED Effect: Send Signal & WIRED Trigger: Receive Signal

They can to send and receive signals using the new Wired Antennas furni.

Click on the rabbit button to see everything happening with no delay or on the turtle button to see each step at a time.

- A Habbo clicks on one of the buttons to trigger one of the stacks.
- Stack 1 will send a signal to stack 2.
- Stack 2 will change the color of the tile and send a signal to stack 3.
- Stack 3 will rotate the arrow plate and send a signal to stack 4.
- Stack 4 will send a message to the Habbo who clicked the button.

It is triggered when a user clicks on selected furni.

- Click on the blue base light to turn it on/off.
- Click on the pink plasto chair to rotate it.
- Click on the color tile to change its color.
- Click on the pressure plate to show a message.

23lab03.title: Welcome to the Habbo Wired Lab!
23lab04.body:
WIRED Trigger: Furni State Is Changed

It is triggered when the selected furni changes its state, no matter if it is done by a user or not.

Here we present two examples:

1) Every 2 seconds the color and number tiles toggle their states to the next one. The new trigger detects this state change and toggles the other color and number tiles to their previous states;

2) The trigger detects every time the hidden pyramid toggles its state (when it appears and disappears), and then toggles the color of the next color tile. Then, when its color is changed to yellow, the arrow plate is rotated.

23lab05.body:
WIRED Add-on: Execution Limit

It limits the number of executions of a stack in a certain period of time.

Here are two examples:

1) Three identical stacks move one glowball each, but different they have execution limits: 2, 5 or 8 every 10 seconds.

2) This wired also allows you to increase the default limit from 1 time to100. This can be seen in the example with the bots walking.
